activity_differential: people walking and using phones in a shopping mall

description: A shopping mall or entertainment complex interior with multiple people walking, interacting, and the camera moving steadily forward through the space. Some people are using their phones, some are walking together, and children are present. The camera advances through the open area toward escalators and kiosks.
